title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 126.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 126.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) The term permit
when used in this Subchapter shall mean the revocable instrument issued by the

Commissioner of Transportation for any work within the limits of a State
highway. (b) The term permittee
when used in this Subchapter, unless otherwise expressly stated or unless the
context may require otherwise, shall mean a municipality, public utility
company, private corporation, partnership, association or individual in whose
name the permit has been issued. (c) The term main office when used in this

Subchapter shall mean the office of the director of the highway maintenance
subdivision which is located in Building No. 5, State Campus, 1220 Washington

Avenue, Albany, NY 12226. (d) The
term regional office refers to the 10 offices supervised by regional
directors. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
126.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
